title: 用原版制作一个神器- -
author: hot_bread
txt_content:
/give @p ID(此处为ID） 1 0 

{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2333,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}, 

{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:2,UUIDMost:2,Amount:20,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:Knockback}, 

{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:3,UUIDMost:3,Amount:0,AttributeName:generic.followRange,Name:Follow}, 

{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:4,UUIDMost:4,Amount:200,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health}, 

{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:5,UUIDMost:5,Amount:0.1,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed}]} 
复制代码
       敢不敢试试...........逗比新手，高手勿喷.......

replies.txt_content: 使用编辑器即可，有这么麻烦吗 差评

replies.author: -ZCH-
replies.txt_content: 新手就别来水贴还有这根本就不算神器

replies.author: mc红石玩家
replies.txt_content: 当此物品拿在手上时，攻击力加2333，抗击退性加20，生物追踪加0，HP加200，速度加0.1，感觉没太大用，不过新手么，还是鼓励一下吧。
